heading: ***COLD WEATHER ADVISORIES EXPIRING THIS MORNING***Today
text: Some early morning clouds north, otherwise mostly sunny. Not as cold. Highs in the teens to near 20 north, 20 to 25 south. Winds north to northwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 30 mph from the CT Valley into NH.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear, then increasing clouds west of the Green Mountains, spreading east late. Lows 0 to 10 below west and south, rising toward morning, and 5 to 15 below northeast. Winds diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Tuesday
text: Periods of morning sun giving way to clouds west to east. Snow developing in the St. Lawrence and northern NY midday, spreading into areas west of south of I-89 by late. Up to 3 inches in NY. Highs in the 20s to low 30s. Light winds, turning to the south and southeast 5 to 10 mph.
